sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnsystemcntc ( cntc_id , cntc_nm , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , confm_at , use_at , valid_bgnde , valid_endde , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , cntc_ty ) VALUES ( #cntcId# , #cntcNm# , #provdInsttId# , #provdSysId# , #provdSvcId# , #requstInsttId# , #requstSysId# , #confmAt# , #useAt# , #validBgnde# , #validEndde# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() , #cntcTy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnsystemcntc SET cntc_id = #cntcId# , cntc_nm = #cntcNm# , provd_instt_id = #provdInsttId# , provd_sys_id = #provdSysId# , provd_svc_id = #provdSvcId# , requst_instt_id = #requstInsttId# , requst_sys_id = #requstSysId# , confm_at = #confmAt# , use_at = #useAt# , valid_bgnde = #validBgnde# , valid_endde = #validEndde# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , cntc_ty = #cntcTy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND cntc_id = #cntcId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnsystemcntc WHERE 1 = 1 AND cntc_id = #cntcId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT cntc_id , cntc_nm , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , confm_at , use_at , valid_bgnde , valid_endde , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , cntc_ty FROM comtnsystemcntc WHERE cntc_id = #cntcId#

SELECT cntc_id , cntc_nm , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , confm_at , use_at , valid_bgnde , valid_endde , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , cntc_ty FROM comtnsystemcntc WHERE 1=1
cntc_id = #searchKeyword#
cntc_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY cntc_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnsystemcntc WHERE 1=1
cntc_id = #searchKeyword#
cntc_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
